column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The "screaming noise" you describe is an integral part of our corporate culture here at JINYA. As a Japanese company that came to the U.S. nearly 10 years ago
column2: JINYA integrated many service customs that you will find in Japan today
column5: staff are trained to yell greetings ("Irrashai") to show their enthusiasm and genki spirit. Genki (元気) is a common Japanese word that means "energetic
